alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:59PM EDT until August 15 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Robeson County in southeastern North Carolina... North central Dillon County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 459 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Purvis, or 12 miles north of Dillon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Red Springs, Pembroke, Maxton, Rowland, Raemon, South Of The Border, Hestertown, Shannon, Buie, Robeson Community College, Wakulla, Purvis, Prospect, Little Rock, Elrod, Mcdonald, Raynham, and Southeastern Regional Medical Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
